sentences.en: "Wait a damn minute," Mindy spat. "Nobody said anything about staying overnight."
sentences.cn: “该死的，等一下”，明迪愤愤地说道，“谁也没说过要过夜。”

sentences.en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
sentences.cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

sentences.en: a maid was appointed to wait on her.
sentences.cn: 指派了一个女仆来服侍她。

sentences.en: Any changes will have to wait until sponsors can be found.
sentences.cn: 任何改变都要等找到赞助商之后再作决定。

sentences.en: Check us in at the hotel and wait for my call.
sentences.cn: 去宾馆替我们办理好入住手续，然后等我的电话。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: he decided to lie in wait for the thief.
sentences.cn: 他决定埋伏等待那个小偷。

sentences.en: He had to wait months before his case was heard.
sentences.cn: 等了数月后，他的案子才得到审理。

sentences.en: Hurry up! Everyone’s waiting.
sentences.cn: 快点！大家在等着呢。

sentences.en: I want to talk to you, but it can wait.
sentences.cn: 我想和你谈谈，但可以晚点再说。

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: It'll have to wait. This is our busiest time .
sentences.cn: 这事得往后放。这是我们最忙碌的时候。

sentences.en: Let's wait up for the stragglers.
sentences.cn: 让我们等等掉队的人

sentences.en: New owners will have to wait until September before moving in.
sentences.cn: 新业主要等到9月份才能入住。

sentences.en: patrol—wait for it—halt!.
sentences.cn: 巡逻——等待时机——停！。

sentences.en: The spider must wait for prey to be ensnared on its web.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛必须等待猎物被它的蛛网困住。

sentences.en: Their inclination to wait and demand more resources desolated President Lincoln.
sentences.cn: 他们总是等待并要求得到更多资财的倾向让林肯总统甚感不快。

sentences.en: There were plenty of servants to wait on her.
sentences.cn: 有很多仆人服侍她。

sentences.en: They have to wait for clearance from air traffic control.
sentences.cn: 他们需要等空中交通管制人员的放行。

sentences.en: They're waiting on my decision.
sentences.cn: 他们在等我的决定

sentences.en: wait on, I've an important message for you.
sentences.cn: 等着，我有重要消息告诉你。

sentences.en: wait out a war; waited out the miniskirt craze.
sentences.cn: 直等到战争结束；等到迷你裙风潮过后

sentences.en: Wait there for a minute. I have to make a phone call.
sentences.cn: 在那儿等一会儿，我得打个电话。

sentences.en: We’ve been waiting ages.
sentences.cn: 我们已经等了很长时间了。

sentences.en: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.cn: 你在外面等好吗？

sentences.en: you wait until your Dad gets in!.
sentences.cn: 等着，你爸来了再说！。

phrases.tran_cn: 伺机（攻击敌人或潜在的牺牲品）
请稍候，请稍等；请您稍候；正在暖机等待结束再开始使用
(澳／新西兰，北英格兰，非正式)等待，等候
【非正式用语】 等：为使别人赶上而停止或暂停
（表示威胁，警告或许诺）等着瞧；等着吧

trans.tran_en: a period of time in which you wait for something to happen, someone to arrive etc
to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc

trans.tran_cn: 等（候），盼望，准备妥当，推迟，延缓，服务，服侍
trans.tran_en: to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc
to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc
